mapper.select: select count(a.report_time) from (select report_time from th_video_matter_report where matter_id = #{id} group by report_time) a

select ifnull(sum(d.reportCost),'0') from th_video_matter a left join th_video_order b on a.order_id = b.id left join th_video_need c on a.order_id = c.order_id left join (select matter_id, truncate(avg(average_play_time_per_play),2) averagePlayTimePerPlay,sum(total_play) totalPlay,sum(report_cost) reportCost,sum(report_show) reportShow from th_video_matter_report
and report_time >= left (#{timeRange},10) and report_time <= right(#{timeRange},10)
group by matter_id) d on a.id = d.matter_id
and c.product_name like concat('%',#{productName},'%')
and c.video_dept = #{videoDept}
and c.video_group = #{videoGroup}
and a.file_name like concat('%', #{fileName}, '%')
and a.create_time >= left (#{timeRange},10) and a.create_time <= right(#{timeRange},10)
